nodes.text: You begin your adventure in a foreign land, where magic thrives. Before you is a man. You ask the man on which path to take and he offers to guide you. You sense that he could be up to something bad, but you think there may be a chance to convince him to take you somewhere safe.

options.text: Ask the man for directions (25 CHA)
Ignore the man and take the left path
Ignore the man and take the right path

nodes.label: Start adventure
Village
nodes.text: You arrive at a beautiful village. The villagers are celebrating a festival. You get invited to celebrate at a nearby pub. Do you wish to go?

nodes.label: Kingdom
nodes.text: You go the kingdom, only to see it has been ruined and there's no one there. No one but a child that is.

nodes.label: Pub
nodes.text: You start noticing oddities about the villagers. Their smile never disappears, and they all sound similar to one another. You don't feel good about this.

nodes.label: Deeper village
nodes.text: You go deeper in the village, and keep hearing the same music and same voices. You believe it is better to get out of the village before it's too late. Yet, your body almost wants to stay.

nodes.label: Drink
nodes.text: As you take a sip, you start feeling weak. You realize you've made a grave mistake. You wake up, and all you can do is cheer and dance, with no control over your body. You have fallen prey to the maddening.

nodes.label: Festival
nodes.text: As you keep listening to the music, you start losing control of your body. You realize you've made a grave mistake. You have fallen prey to the maddening.You are stuck in an eternal loop of dancing. You join the villagers in their unending cry for help.
